description: Erection of a third floor extension to existing block of flats to provide a 1 bedroom unit with terrace.
decision_conditions: <p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-998181be-7fff-ffc4-e898-75a30e879590"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than three years after the date of this permission.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-59cb98c4-7fff-cbad-ddff-aa598c03df8d"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91(1) of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 as amended.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Prior to commencement of works on the development hereby approved, a cycle parking layout plan shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority.</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-dcc42fbc-7fff-30b2-31da-992bd8b7fcda"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure that a reasonable provision is made within the site for the parking of bicycles in the interest of relieving congestion in surrounding streets and improving highway conditions in general.</span></p>

<p><span id="docs-internal-guid-764920be-7fff-99dc-f0c7-276d79138852"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">The proposed development hereby approved shall match the existing roof extensions in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance.</span></span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-764920be-7fff-99dc-f0c7-276d79138852"><span style="font-size: 10pt; font-family: Arial; background-color: transparent; font-variant-numeric: normal; font-variant-east-asian: normal; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap;">REASON: To ensure a high standard of design and suitable materiality. <br></span></span><br></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">Details of bird and bat boxes to be implemented as part of the development, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority, prior to occupation of the development hereby approved</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-daa3ed85-7fff-cd3a-1f1b-5612772b1e91"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:12pt;font-family:'Arial ';color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: To provide potential habitat for local wildlife.</span></p>

<p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-left: 35.45pt;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">A Construction Logistics Plan (CLP) specifying hours of working, construction traffic routing, measures to prevent dust pollution and contact arrangements between residents and contractors shall be submitted and agreed by the Local Planning Authority Prior to the commencement of the development. The construction shall thereafter take place in accordance with the measures identified within the CLP.&nbsp;</span></p><p><span id="docs-internal-guid-335183a7-7fff-ed56-0a7c-fa74386a899b"><br></span></p><p dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.2;margin-left: 35.45pt;text-align: justify;margin-top:0pt;margin-bottom:0pt;"><span style="font-size:11pt;font-family:Arial;color:#000000;background-color:transparent;font-weight:400;font-style:normal;font-variant:normal;text-decoration:none;vertical-align:baseline;white-space:pre;white-space:pre-wrap;">REASON: In order to ensure that the development does not prejudice the amenity of adjoining occupiers.</span></p>
